Name: Deadly Station
About the game: The government built a space station on the moon for the purpose of conducting research. Many were taken there to work as prisoners, you were one of those. Horror based action game themed in future, that includes a dark story about a prisoner of delerict space station. Features: -Chapter based story: Play game divided into multiple chapter, each with multiple choices. -Sandbox style levels: Explore different locations and discover the ruins after war. -Rpg elements: Collect and gather items to help you advance in story. -Action combat: Fight against enemies with meele and guns.
